title: Sambucus Gummies | Nature's Way®
description: Gummies made with a blend of high potency vitamins C & D and an excellent source of zinc to support immune health with highly concentrated black elderberry extract.*
cleaned_text: Sambucus Gummies Quality Immune Support from Nature* Delicious gummies, bursting with benefits. Sambucus Gummies with black elderberry extract combine zinc, 100% of the recommended Daily Value of vitamin C and 150% of the recommended Daily Value of vitamin D to support your immune system all year long.* These yummy gummies are a favorite for use during back to school season and in the winter months. Quality Immune Support from Nature* Delicious gummies, bursting with benefits. Sambucus Gummies with black elderberry extract combine zinc, 100% of the recommended Daily Value of vitamin C and 150% of the recommended Daily Value of vitamin D to support your immune system all year long.* These yummy gummies are a favorite for use during back to school season and in the winter months. Better Berries You deserve the best, which is why we travel to select locations across Europe to source the most potent, high-quality elderberries possible. Each berry is 100% handpicked and harvested at its peak by farmers with generations of knowledge, then turned into a potent extract packed with natural antioxidants from anthocyanins. Sambucus elderberry gummies, syrups, lozenges, and more are a deliciously beneficial way to care for yourself each day. Each berry is 100% handpicked and harvested at its peak by farmers with generations of knowledge, then turned into a potent extract packed with natural antioxidants from anthocyanins. Sambucus elderberry gummies, syrups, lozenges, and more are a deliciously beneficial way to care for yourself each day. Product Highlights Triple Action Immune Blend* Formulated with black elderberry extract for traditional immune support.* Vitamin C and Zinc help support immune function.* Triple Action Immune Blend* Formulated with black elderberry extract for traditional immune support.* Vitamin C and Zinc help support immune function.* Premium Elderberries Our extract is made from unique varieties of black elderberries with a higher level of naturally occurring flavonoids. Premium Elderberries Our extract is made from unique varieties of black elderberries with a higher level of naturally occurring flavonoids. Great Tasting Bursting with berry flavor, Sambucus Gummies are gelatin-free, gluten-free, and contain no artificial colors. Great Tasting Bursting with berry flavor, Sambucus Gummies are gelatin-free, gluten-free, and contain no artificial colors. 20 Calories 5g Total Carbohydrate 3g Total Sugars 6% Includes 3 g Added Sugars 90mg Vitamin C (ascorbic acid) 30mcg Vitamin D (as cholecalciferol) 7.5mg Zinc (as zinc citrate) 15mg Sodium 50mg Black Elder (Sambucus nigra L.) Extract (berry) standardized to anthocyanins from 3,200 mg of premium cultivar elderberries ** Daily Value (DV) not established Percent daily value is based on a 2000 calorie diet Other Ingredients Sambucus Gummies Does Not Contain Yeast - Derived Ingredient Gluten Soy Dairy Colors Wheat Egg Peanut Other Details UPC: 033674123454 SKU: 12345 Sambucus Gummies Directions and/or DosageAdults and children 4 years of age and older, chew 2 gummies daily. Instruct child to chew gummies thoroughly before swallowing. Not formulated for children under 4 years of age. Do not exceed recommended daily dose. WarningIf you are pregnant, nursing, or taking any medications, consult a healthcare professional before use. Keep out of reach of children. Do not use if safety seal under child-resistant cap is broken or missing. Keep tightly closed. Store at room temperature. Avoid excessive heat and direct sunlight. Sambucus Gummies are made with high-quality black elderberry extract from black elderberries from Europe. They are sweetened with organic tapoica syrup and cane sugar and are gluten- and gelatin-free. Adults and children 4+ can take Sambucus Gummies at any time of day, whenever it works best for your schedule. Yes, you can definitely take these delicious gummies every day! Sambucus Gummies are made with vitamin C and zinc for immune support, plus black elderberry extract, which has traditionally been used to support immunity, especially in the winter months.* Adults may take Sambucus Gummies and Sleep + Immune Gummies in the same day if you require the extra support.* Sambucus Gummies Quality Immune Support from Nature* Delicious gummies, bursting with benefits.
